English | Ancient | Modern | POS | Notes
hello | salaam | salaam | n | greeting
world | dunya | dunya | n | earth
water | maa | maa | n | liquid
fire | nar | nar | n | flame
wind | hawa | hawa | n | air
earth | ard | ard | n | ground
sun | shams | shams | n | star
moon | qamar | qamar | n | satellite
star | najm | najm | n | celestial body
tree | shajar | shajar | n | plant
